body: Fixed in eb1726fe6dce36b798a75303b43b3c0eca9f3518
另外，这个例子，其实可以使用 `series.type: 'tree'`。

因为您没有提供 option，所以不能知道这个问题的具体原因。
但是我猜测可能可以设置 `yAxis.axisLine.onZero: false` 试试。
去掉 `areaStyle: {}` 试试？
`tooltip: {trigger: 'axis'}` 即可。
Try <http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#grid.right> please ~

Hello, I am currently using echarts for showing graphs on my web. I wanted to try echarts ver 4.04 to render the graphs in svg but I keep getting this error message.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37879563-29c117f2-30a5-11e8-9afb-9bdfbe445ae1.png)


It's happened when I wanted to show text label in every single bar (on the right) like this one :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37879519-702ed4c8-30a4-11e8-803e-ffd078afc1f9.png)

Hope it can be fixed. Thank you.

Hei I got this in my notebook too. But after I restarted jupyter and reran the notebook, the warnings are gone. So I was not able to reproduce it later.

https://github.com/pyecharts/pyecharts/issues/430

@chfw really? but in my case, I still cannot get rid of it... I have tried to produce other bar graph type and when I show the label on it, it still shows the error.

btw, other bugs I've spotted :
I wanted to produce a stacked bar chart like this one :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37880284-fd025e1e-30af-11e8-9e41-9f08f6d4cfa0.png)

but, when I change the type of yAxis to 'log', it cannot produce the graphs and shows error :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37880289-0b338418-30b0-11e8-951f-e2d75d54b545.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37880291-13976958-30b0-11e8-9bbe-c65f68a9b6eb.png)

and of course, when I try to put the label inside of every single bar it still shows the error I mention above.
Thank you for hearing me out.
请问如何在一个series里面自定义tooltip，可否给一下具体的代码实例？
求解，万分感谢，大佬们！！！ @100pah @leeight @cnberg @xvaara @firede
这到底是不是bug???还是我配置错误？？求解，谢谢大佬！！！ @100pah @leeight @cnberg @xvaara @firede

简单的来说，要给总的声明的那个 tooltips 加 「showContent: false 」,子类的加 「showContent:true」
具体请看代码，链接失效联系我。

[代码](https://github.com/mysteryven/blog-generator-/blob/master/source/_posts/%E4%B8%BAEcharts%E7%9A%84series%E5%8D%95%E7%8B%AC%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0tooltips.md)
IE8 及以下的版本不支持导出图片的功能，可以考虑使用服务端渲染
可以参考这里http://echarts.baidu.com/api.html#action
3ks

In my case I use it to visualise medication adherence, i.e. how many tablets a patient has taken out of the total per day. I want to have an overview of the continuous data, i.e. if the medication is stopped or not required for the day, a gap will be shown in the bar chart. Example in the above screenshot, 2017-08-05 and 2017-08-07 does not show because no medication is prescribed, but it will be helpful to visualise that to the doctor. A bar chart is used in this case to visualise the percentage completion of the daily dosage. I cannot think of alternative ways to display it other than stacked bar on time axis so any advice is welcomed.
我现在用的4.0版本 重新setOption动画还是不连续
我使用了nameMap后，中文的国家名称显示位置发生偏移是怎么回事？比如俄罗斯和美国已经偏移出国家主体领土了

@liukefu2050 参考第一点，把[geoFixFuncs](https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/blob/master/src/coord/geo/Geo.js#L113-L115)移到[loadGeoJson](https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/blob/master/src/coord/geo/Geo.js#L77)的`try catch`后面，即`nameMap`生效之前，即可解决问题

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21271890/37899626-a3e11e1e-311e-11e8-875d-4aae3419ced4.png)
类似这种效果，需要将links的两端偏移，请问还有别的方案吗
不错，感谢楼主

well i tried it but it just have a weirds issue, i make grid left and right 10% and it just feels not right comparing with chartjs it have a responsive parameters that can automatically create grid size according to the container.
shit

Hi! I wanted to report another bug I've found.

I have a graph like below. Everything works perfectly when I used 'canvas' renderer.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37946465-ab9e313c-31af-11e8-99dd-788198c0c0fd.png)

and this one is a screenshot when I use the magicType tools.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37946494-d6c5e2ba-31af-11e8-8019-aa8d367ca721.png)

But when I use 'svg' renderer, I cannot change the bar graph into line graph and shows error like picture below.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37946502-e4450d76-31af-11e8-8661-c794a58fef82.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37946517-f778f7b8-31af-11e8-9d3e-cab87bb2e985.png)

and I also notice that when I hover to the magicType tools, the 'title' text that should have appear below the icon goes to the edge on the top left of the graph. 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28089698/37946668-c90b30b6-31b0-11e8-820e-e22d491f16bf.png)

Hope it can be fixed soon because I really love this chart. Thank you and keep up the good work!

@rafinkanisa I fixed this problem in https://github.com/ecomfe/zrender/commit/be3fb89d6079f216d0779adf8378534ba715d175 .
Please wait for the next release, or you may build echarts by yourself.

To build:
1. clone echarts project
2. run `npm i`
3. run `node build/build.js --release`

Full tutorial: https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/tutorial.html#Create%20Custom%20Build%20of%20ECharts
@Ovilia Wow. Thank you...
bug出在listProto.getIndices 函数，将函数listProto.getIndices的1~5行注掉可以暂时解决
series.type=tree 当减少数据时会报错 这个是不是也是跟这个一样的bug?当增加数据时是没有问题的，但减少数据时就直接报错@kener @kener @Jaware
用WKWebView，而不是UIWebView，可以解决iOS11上这类问题，包括fixed元素滚动的时候消失的问题。或者等到iOS 11.3（用beta版试过，怀疑iOS11.3的webview用了WKWebView，或者做了升级）
Think is new-feature: https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/issues/8014

Sorry, just found that:

dataView: { show: true, readOnly: false, title: "tool" },

works...great!!! Awesome library.

You must install echarts3.8.5 and depend on zrender for 3.7.4 and finally install echarts-gl1.0.0-beta.6.
install modules. like this:
npm i echarts@3.8.5 zrender@3.7.4 echarts-gl@1.0.0-beta.6
introduced modules,like this:
import echarts from 'echarts';
require('echarts-gl')
I hope I can help you.

Same issue here, I use echarts to visualize memory consumption over time and I stack the memory usages to display the repartition of the overall memory usage.
eg: heap memory + off-heap memory = total memory consumed, thus I want to stack series as in the following plot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6229788/38091732-af0538c6-3366-11e8-95f7-c68084feb4aa.png)

没用哦，按照你们给的参数也是报错 Error in mounted hook: "TypeError: axisModel.getCategories is not a function"
版本是4.0.4

Order the data first indeed solves this problem.
However, this solution would also change the order of legend, and the order of tooltip.
Have a option to reverse the stack order would be helpful.

Hi there,

**Problem**
I run into similar issue with label overflowing the donut-chart. 

**Problem**
JsFiddle: http://jsfiddle.net/coolbean/cj31rtpf/418/
In the jsFiddle, you can see one long name in the data "aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa", which will be used as "label" for the chart.
Since the name is really long, its length will exceeds the donut (overflowing).

**What I expect**
if the label is too big for the wrapping circle, its label text should : 
1. be displayed as "aaa..." where "..." implies overflowing. When user hover over the label, the full text will be displayed.
2. be broken into multiple lines based on user specified width and height fields on the label option. When a line exceeds the specified width, the text will start on the new line.

**Possible solution**
My current workaround are:
1. Limit the size/content of the label via label.formatter. FontSize need to be dynamic based on current Chart size.

**Question**
I am wondering if there is an Echart option to handle this case.
@MrLiZ 跟屏幕尺寸没关系吧？就是 K 线图有多少数据，成交量里对应就有多少数据，没有数据的用占位
